shadowman.service
Class SystemService

java.lang.Object
  shadowman.service.SystemService

@Service(value="systemService")
public class SystemService
extends Object

CometD service subscribing to all /system/** related channels.

Method Detail

handleGlobalDeleteAllPento

@Listener(value="/system/admin/global/deleteallpento")
public void handleGlobalDeleteAllPento(org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerSession remote,
                                                org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerMessage message)
Will conditionally delete all data within the pento database. Will also subsequently broadcast a message to the /system/admin/local/deleteallpento channel among all known agents, including the local agent. This operation will only be carried out if the agent is currently running in "demo mode" per AgentConfiguration.isDemoMode()

Parameters:
remote - The ServerSession representing the sender
message - The incoming message. The contents of the message are ignored

handleLocalDeleteAllPento

@Listener(value="/system/admin/local/deleteallpento")
public void handleLocalDeleteAllPento(org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerSession remote,
                                               org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerMessage message)
Will conditionally delete all data within the pento database. This operation will only be carried out if the agent is currently running in "demo mode" per AgentConfiguration.isDemoMode()

Parameters:
remote - The ServerSession representing the sender
message - The incoming message. The contents of the message are ignored

handleListDistrubutions

@Listener(value="/system/info/distributions")
public void handleListDistrubutions(org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerSession remote,
                                             org.cometd.bayeux.server.ServerMessage message)
Obtains the names of all registered distributions and delivers to the remote on the /info/distributions channel

Parameters:
remote - The ServerSession representing the sender and recipient
message - The incoming message. The contents of the message are ignored
